name: Russian Love Story
detailed_description:
Genres: visual novel, ADV, ecchi, mystery
Length: 1-3 hours

Who has never dreamed of living a different life, especially if yours is so gray and boring? Our hero, an ordinary unappealing clerk, was lucky enough to learn how to leave his physical body and put his own astral projection into other people. To see though their senses and remain unknown. Although, it's not all smooth sailing, because it's possible to get trapped in someone else's body and not be able to return. And life as a silent observer can drive anyone crazy. The hero will have to learn to get along with the master of his new body and either take actions themselves or let him take the lead, though who knows which options is the best one. Partially based on real events.

There's an exciting adventure waiting for you, the story will unravel based on your choices with multiple endings. The game features beautiful art and a pleasant soundtrack. Get comfy and enjoy your reading.

short_description: Who has never dreamed of living a different life, especially if yours is so gray and boring?

pc_requirements.minimum:
Минимальные:
  • ОС: Microsoft® Windows® XP / Vista
  • Процессор: Dual Core 2.0 GHz
  • Оперативная память: 1024 MB ОЗУ
  • Видеокарта: 256 MB
  • DirectX: Версии 9.0
  • Место на диске: 200 MB
  • Звуковая карта: DirectX® Compatible
pc_requirements.recommended:
Рекомендованные:
  • ОС: Microsoft® Windows® 7 or later
  • Процессор: Intel Core i3 (or equivalent)
  • Оперативная память: 2048 MB ОЗУ
  • Видеокарта: 256 MB or higher
  • DirectX: Версии 9.0
  • Место на диске: 200 MB
  • Звуковая карта: DirectX® Compatible
